questions: why is my order arriving in many packages
why is my order divided into many packages
why is my order arriving in multiple packages
answers: It may be necessary to send your order in two or more shipments. Shipping charges apply only to the first package shipped. There are no additional shipping charges for additional packages on the same order. Restrictions may apply. Missing Packages Be sure to check around your house and mailbox, or ask your neighbors if they received it for you. There's also a chance it was marked ‘Delivered’ before it was dropped off. If your package still hasn’t turned up 72 hours after you received a delivery confirmation, contact customer service at 19600

Return + Exchange Policy: If you're not completely happy with a purchase, just return it for a full refund. Returns with proof of purchase (receipt, invoice, order confirmation page, order details page, order emails) will be refunded in the manner in which the original purchase was made. If you don't have proof of purchase, we'll let you exchange or give you store credit for the current price. If you are charged more than the posted or advertised price, we will refund the difference. If there appears to be a fraud or abuse, we may not return your item. If you buy a swimsuit or bikini bottom & remove the hygienic liner, we will no longer be able to accept the return.

questions: What are your precautions for COVID-19
answers: We continue to make informed decisions based on facts and science, following the guidance of federal, state, and local health organizations. Since the onset of COVID-19, we quickly implemented health and safety measures across our operations based on the direct advice of medical experts and CDC guidelines. We are using the learnings and best practices from our Distribution Centers and are applying the same protocols in our stores and offices.
